URL: Nominations are invited for Distinguished Alumnus Award and Young Alumnus Award 2020. The nomination process closes on 30th September 2020.
PEC welcomed Mr. Bikram Singh Garewal
column3: the university’s oldest alum at Homecoming 2020: Global Alumni Meet. After graduating from PEC in 1943
column4: Mr.Bikram has gone on to achieve many great feats in life.

URL: A MoU was signed between PEC and PEDA for Research and Development Projects on Energy Conservation & Energy Efficiency under Bureau of Energy Efficiency
PEC has completed 98 wonderful years since it’s foundation in 1921. A celebratory event was organized to mark the foundation of the college. The Chief Guest for the event was Director
One week STC on Micro Manufacturing from 4th to 8th January
Chandigarh Administration has desired Shivalik Hostel to be used as a Quarantine Centre for COVID-19
Manual to Access pec.edu.in Email ID
As a precautionary measure against the spread of Corona Virus
column3: teaching shall remain suspended in the institute indefinitely.
